text: @WhiteHouse I wish Mr.Trump would stop referring to coronavirus as the invisible enemy. It's Not Invisible just microscopic it can be seen with a microscope. In fact there's pictures of it on the wall of most public restrooms. Our most visible enemy is Mr.  Trump. America deserves better.
